text:
March 30, 2018 / 8:28 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Boston Beer Company Says Entered Agreement To Amend Co's Existing $150 Mln Revolving Line Of Credit Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  Boston Beer Company Inc: 
* BOSTON BEER COMPANY - ON MARCH 27, ENTERED AGREEMENT TO AMEND COâ€™S EXISTING $150 MILLION REVOLVING LINE OF CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING 
* BOSTON BEER COMPANY - AMENDMENT EXTENDS MATURITY DATE OF CREDIT FACILITY UNDER LINE OF CREDIT AGREEMENT FROM MARCH 31, 2019 TO MARCH 31, 2023 Source text: [ bit.ly/2IdPIqo ] Further company coverage:
